SEGMENT_TEXT: Hi I'm calling because my internet has been down for two days
I'm sorry to hear that Let me pull up your account and see what's going on
I've already called twice and nothing has been fixed This is really frustrating
I completely understand your frustration Let me check our network status in your area
I see there was a fiber cable cut in your neighborhood We have technicians working on it right now
When will it be fixed I work from home and this is costing me money
The repair should be completed within the next 2 hours And I'd like to credit your account for the downtime
That would be helpful Thank you for checking on that
Hello I have a question about my bill this month
Of course I'd be happy to help What's your question
There's a charge for equipment rental but I own my own modem
Let me check your account I can see you do have your own modem registered with us
This looks like a billing error I'll remove that charge right away and credit it back
Great thank you so much That was easier than I expected
I want to cancel my service
I'm sorry to hear you're considering canceling May I ask what prompted this decision
The service keeps going down and the price keeps going up I'm tired of dealing with it
I understand your concerns Let me see what I can do to make this right for you
I can offer you a discount on your monthly rate and prioritize a technician visit to address the reliability
How much of a discount are we talking about
I can reduce your bill by 20 dollars per month for the next 12 months
And you can send someone to fix the connection issues
Yes I'll schedule a technician for tomorrow morning Is 9 AM good for you
OK let's try that If it doesn't work out I'll call back to cancel
Hi I'm interested in upgrading my service plan
Excellent What are you looking to add to your current service
I want faster internet speed I currently have the 100 meg plan
Great We have a 500 megabit plan and a gigabit plan available in your area
What's the price difference
The 500 meg plan is 30 dollars more per month and the gig plan is 50 dollars more
I'll take the gigabit plan Can you set that up today
Absolutely I can activate that remotely right now You should see the new speeds within the hour
Perfect thank you
My TV service isn't working channels won't load
I can help you with that Let's do some troubleshooting Have you tried restarting your set-top box
Yes I unplugged it for a minute and plugged it back in Nothing changed
OK let me send a refresh signal to your box This should take about 2 minutes
Alright I'm waiting
The signal has been sent Can you try changing channels now
Yes it's working now Great Thank you so much
You're welcome Is there anything else I can help you with today
No that's all Thanks again
